prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Charles Dudley Warner Collection, Accession # 6990-j, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was deposited on November 8, 1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection includes an endorsement, 1905 October 11, New Haven, Connecticut, from William Lyon Phelps, of The Writings of Charles Dudley Warner,and four frontispieces signed by B. West Clinedinst, C. Allan Gilbert, Frederick Dielman, and Peter Newell.

did.unittitle: Manuscript endorsement by William Lyon Phelps of the autograph edition of the complete works of Charles Dudley Warner. October 11, 1905
Frontispiece for The Writings of Charles Dudley Warner1904

scopecontent.p: Entitled "Voudoo dance," signed by the illustrator, B. West Clinedinst

did.unittitle: Frontispiece for The Writings of Charles Dudley Warner1904

scopecontent.p: Signed by the illustrator, C. Allan Gilbert

did.unittitle: Frontispiece for The Writings of Charles Dudley Warnern.d.

scopecontent.p: Entitled "Picturesque as their town," signed by the illustrator, Frederick Dielman

did.unittitle: Frontispiece for The Writings of Charles Dudley Warnern.d.

scopecontent.p: Entitled "Reaching the Summit," signed by the illustrator, Peter Newell
